author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss a linux community effort to crowd fund the fixing of a speaker issue on the Lenovo Legion Pro 7. Could this become a more common method for fixing bugs in Free and Open Source operating systems? Follow the saga at this git repo https://github.com/nadimkobeissi/16iax10h-linux-sound-saga

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

title: Can Crowd Funded Tech Support Fix a Linux Sound Bug?
